messages.subject: Re: [samuraihistory] Samurai Clothing
messages.msgSnippet: Hakama isn t easy to make. I suggest you to buy Kendo Hakama. This is how to make Hakama look-alike.(Japanese) http://yousai.net/nui/hakama/hakama.htm
messages.messageBody:
Hakama isn't easy to make.
I suggest you to buy Kendo Hakama.

This is how to make Hakama look-alike.(Japanese)
http://yousai.net/nui/hakama/hakama.htm

shikisoku

messages.messageBody:
Hi.
I do not remember the web-page right now, but since I
am a Iai do follower I was looking for hakamas on the
web. you can find patrons to duplicate one on the
web by simply typing hakama on any search motor.
regards.

messages.messageBody:
Hello, my name is Craig Poling. I am trying to find out any
information on how the Japanese constructed the Gi and Hakama since I
am trying to build them for a small film I am making... can nay of you
